item.description:
Hi Everyone!

There are about 20 people signed up so far from various groups.  Try to join us- it will be fun!

If you want to go for a scenic walk on a beautiful autumn day, meet us at 1:30  in the parking area on Wallace Rd (follow the brown signs) to Westville Recreation Area.  It's a 1.8 mile easy walk.  Wallace Rd is off of Breakneck Rd which is off of South St.  Funrther down South St is the restaurant.

A very friendly group of German speakers will be there.

 

We have been invited by the West Hartford, CT German Meetup to join them and other German groups for a Multi-group Meetup.  
Spaziergang on the Greenway by the river starting at 1:30 p.m., following by Happy Hour and late lunch/early dinner at the Vienna Restaurant in Southbridge, MA starting at 3:00 p.m. I checked out their web-site (http://www.thevienna.com/WelcomeViennaHomepage.htm) and they have a great selection of German and Austrian Foods. Everything sounds really yummy!  Many people rave about this restaurant.  It is in an old, historic Inn with fireplaces in each dining room.

Unfortunately I will be traveling on Oct. 16th and won't be able to join you guys, but I am sure the West Hartford group will welcome you and take good care of you if you decide to join.

Also - viel Spass und guten Hunger!!

 

Bis bald, Hanna
item.how_to_find_us: Dianne from the West Hartford meetup will be hosting this event!
item.name: Meetup Treffen with other German groups
